comment.author: 14170629@N08
comment._content: Taken outside the clubhouse of his namesake racetrack, Belmont Park.  Likely from May 20, 1915, as are others in the set.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: I agree with you spotboslow, that the photo was most likely taken on May 20, 1915 at Belmont Park.  Thanks so much for your research.  We'll add some of this information to the record the next time we update.
